Title: Relates to establishing an electronic open auction public bond sale pilot program for certain municipalities
Summary: Establishes an electronic open auction public bond sale pilot program for certain municipalities, to be administered by the municipality's chief fiscal officer; calls for an evaluation of the program annually.
LawCode: Add ยง58.20, Loc Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the local finance law, in relation to the establishment of an electronic open auction public bond sale pilot program for certain municipalities; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
